layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 242x584 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 240x582
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,0) size 240x560
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (0,269) size 240x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 222x19
                text run at (1,1) width 222: "Table cell without height restriction"
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,560) size 240x22
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (0,560) size 240x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 238x19
                text run at (1,1) width 238: "This table cell should be 5 pixels high"
